fields.summary: Duplicate Key in Json Output for Job details

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: History Server task attempts REST API returns invalid data

comments.body:
I have changed TaskAttemptInfo to the abstract class and added MapTaskAttemptInfo class for MAP tasks. Also, added @XmlElementRef annotation to TaskAttemptInfo collection in TaskAttemptsInfo class to provide information about type during marshaling. Removed redundant annotations.
I tested this fix locally, for now, a response of both json and xml format is valid.

Could someone review this patch?
Thanks for any comment.

I found the issue MAPREDUCE-6440 which describe the same problem (did not see this one before). In this ticket was proposed to rename the property in TaskAttemptInfo but this is the incompatible change and this looks like the workaround. I think we can to fix the main cause of the problem and save backward compatibility.

Added getter for TaskAttemptInfo.type (getter for this property was missing before) to fix "FindBugs Unread public/protected field:At TaskAttemptInfo.java:[line 61]".

Added check on attributes for xml format as it's caused by incorrect determination of the type and lead to property duplicating. We can check only xsi:type attribute for our case but for now, there is no reason to get any attribute to REST response. So, I check all attributes.
